title.label: Game mechanic problems on Iphone Xs

content.label: Idk if its just an iphone Xs problem but the joysticks when using the ufo planes just lock in place randomly making u crash/miss a lot of shots and also, why in the world do enemy planes collect red hearts, its the most annoying thing when you chase a red heart that you oh so need in the battle with the kraken only for an enemy to pickit up and waste it, please fix these problems otherwise I really loved the hit of nostalgia, I couldnt believe my eyes when i saw this back on the app store.

title.label: Unlocked completed game if you bought it before

For those who have deep pockets this game is probably the best on the appstore

title.label: Nostalgic, Modern 1943 Like Game with Great Game Play, Effects & Music

content.label: I love this game! Extremely fun and easy to play with no learning commitment. It's a straight forward shoot em up dog fight.  Lots of planes to choose from. The survival mode is awesome!  I wish more games were like this on iOS.
I've always been a fan of this game. One of my all time favorites. Please make a new HD version!
Loved this game so much when I had it on my iPod touch 4, but can you please make a remastered version for iPad and iPhone with multiplayer? One of my all time top favorite games.

Need to have on iPad!! Awesome game
